prompt: Dark Privacy Policy page: charcoal background, white title, gray subtitle, four sections with white headers and gray text, and accept/decline buttons at the bottom.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override

          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,

            Text(
              'This policy details how we manage and protect your personal information.',

              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 30),
            Text(

              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 10),
            Text(
              'We gather data you share, like account details and usage patterns.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[400],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 30),
            Text(
              'Data Usage',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,

              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 10),
            Text(
              'Your information helps us tailor services and improve functionality.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,

                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 30),
            Text(
              'Data Protection',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 10),
            Text(
              'We use advanced encryption to safeguard your data.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[400],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 30),
            Text(
              'Get in Touch',
              style: TextStyle(

                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 10),
            Text(
              'Contact us at info@company.com for any inquiries.',
              style: TextStyle(

            SizedBox(height: 40),
            Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.end,
              children: [
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  child: Text('Accept', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.white)),
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.green,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 24, vertical: 16),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
                SizedBox(width: 12),
                OutlinedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  child: Text('Decline', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.green)),
                  style: OutlinedButton.styleFrom(
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 24, vertical: 16),

                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
